page.title: 13Transport
page.content: The main bus service has stops at Fordoun twelve times a day, six on the way north to Aberdeen via Stonehaen and six on the way south to Dundee. Since the building of the dual carriageway th secondary school bus comes down the A92 from Stonehaven to Inverbervie and crosses from there to A94. In a ten minute period during a weekday the following vehicles went past Fordoun: 44 cars, 24 lorries, 12 vans and 2 trains. Trains pass very close to Fordoun. The station is now disused. Very near our area is a airfield which is discused except for a light plane which flies at the weekend, sometimes carrying parachute jumpers.
